title: Patch Notes
content: the combat with Malus Thorm in Tactician and Honour Mode. We've suggested to Yurgir that when he's invisible he should take advantage of it and actually try to move around a little so that he's harder to find. Improved the Thisobald Thorm combat in Honour Mode: Fixed his Legendary Action explosion hitting itself. Increased the damage and radius of his Legendary Action explosion. His Legendary Action explosion now applies a debuff based on the explosion type. Increased the damage of the buff give
